rooms.description: A combined living and dining space with ample natural light, incorporating Vastu principles by ensuring the seating area is oriented in a south-east direction for prosperity.
Modern kitchen layout designed with efficient workflow and natural ventilation, positioned on the eastern side to harness morning sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom with a balcony facing the north-west for peaceful sleep and privacy, designed in an industrial style.
Functional guest bedroom with a balcony facing the north-west to ensure restful sleep and additional space for relaxation.
Multi-functional bathroom for both ground floor occupants, positioned centrally in compliance with accessibility norms.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with the auspicious south direction according to Vastu guidelines.
Large windows to ensure abundant natural light and ventilation across living spaces.
